                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
After a terrorist bombing kills an American envoy in a foreign country. An 
investigation leads to an Egyptian who has been living in the United States for 
years and who is married to an American. He is apprehended when he&#039;s on his way 
home. The U.S. sends him to the country where the incident occurs for 
interrogation which includes torture. An American CIA operative observes the 
interrogation and is at odds whether to keep it going or to stop it. In the 
meantime, the man&#039;s wife raises hell to find him despite being pregnant but the 
person behind this refuses to help or give her any information.

Director: Gavin Hood

Writer  : Kelley Sane

Cast    : Omar Metwally
        : Reese Witherspoon
        : Aramis Knight
        : Rosie Malek-Yonan
        : Jake Gyllenhaal

Enjoy the movie.
